solution_line_template: In {months_until_fight} months, he will lose {weight_loss_per_month} x {months_until_fight} = <<{weight_loss_per_month}*{months_until_fight}={total_weight_loss}>>{total_weight_loss} kilograms.
So his weight will be {initial_weight} – {total_weight_loss} = <<{initial_weight}-{total_weight_loss}={final_weight}>>{final_weight} kilograms.
